name: Exposed
description:
Kotlin Exposed is a lightweight SQL library (an ORM framework) for Kotlin. It provides two layers of database interaction:
· DSL (Domain Specific Language): A type-safe, Kotlin-idiomatic way to write and execute SQL queries, letting you work with databases without writing raw SQL strings.
· DAO (Data Access Objects): An object-oriented API that allows you to treat database rows as Kotlin objects.
opinion: It's a technologi I really like to use, so confortable to work with.
